name: Meribo
description: You are on Meribo-Isle and must search the holy dungeon. With one button you can use your sword but you must find it first. With the second button you shoot fireballs, but they are limited. But you can collect if you kill monsters magicpoints. And HP you can collect. When you touch a monster you are rotating and lose hitpoints. When you walk in the spikes, you lose hitpoints, too. To come to the next level you must search the warp-stone.
